Title: The Bourne Identity
Writer: Tony Gilroy, William Blake Herron, Robert Ludlum
Actors: Franka Potente, Matt Damon, Chris Cooper
Plot: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.
Language: English, French, German, Dutch, Italian, Yoruba
Country: United States, Germany, Czech Republic, Greece
